1390760.name: Nanzou: The Divine Court
1390760.description:
Welcome to Nanzou, Exceptional Soul!
Nanzou: The Divine Court is a genre-mixing city builder set in a living and ever-changing world inspired by Chinese myths and legends.

Summoned by the Emperor of the Divine Court, You, the Exceptional Soul arrive on Nanzou – a mystical floating island, drifting somewhere in an unknown time and space. Your task is simple. Command souls to fulfill the Emperor’s Will.

Magnificent genre mix!
While being a city builder at its very core, the game features elements of other strategy subgenres, with diplomacy and trading with other cities, as well as wuxia hero-focused turn-based combat!

Across Valleys, Mountaintops and Floating Isles
Expand your City across multiple levels of height with unique features, resources, pros and cons. Connect them with roads, bridges, and lifts to create efficient supply chains throughout your city.

The Mysterious Living World
Explore and interact with the living world of Nanzou with procedurally generated cities, characters, and events! Learn about your surroundings, send heroes on adventures, engage in diplomatic talks, or plan trading routes for caravans around the world!

Cities as Battlefields
Throughout the game, your city will face many dangers. During sieges, it will turn into an interactive battlefield, with destructible buildings, defensive structures, and siege weaponry. Train your mythical heroes to defend your city at all costs. You’re not limited to defense though - retaliate and attack the cities of your enemies or fight them in the open world in dynamic turn-based combat!

Simple Rules, Complex Interactions
Every core mechanic in the game is set on an easy to understand foundation with complexity rising over time, to create an experience accessible to everyone. Ultimately, the player will control how challenging they want their experience to be.

We want to hear your voice!
Let us know what you think about the changes via Steam Discussions in the game’s Community section!
Soon we will launch an official Discord server for Nanzou: The Divine Court where you will be able to share your thoughts and suggestions, as well as ask the developers questions about the game!

We will plan and host playtests there too so keep an eye out for future updates!

More cards will be revealed soon…
